Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can directly convert the chemical energy in fuel to electrical energy with fuel flexibility; however, the conventional nickel-based anodes face great challenges due to coking upon direct oxidation of hydrocarbon fuels and redox instability.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, developing new anode materials which can provide high coking resistance as well as redox stability is crucial.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, Ba0.6La0.4Fe0.8Mo0.1Ni0.1O3-delta (BLFMN) has been synthesized in air using a sol-gel combustion method, resulting in a dual phase consisting of a cubic BLFMN main phase and scheelite BaMoO4 (BMO4) secondary phase.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By heat-treating the BLFMN dual phase in H-2 at 800 degrees C for 5 h, a metallic nanoparticle-decorated BLFMN triple phase compound comprising cubic BLFMN, cubic BaMoO3 (BMO3) and in situ exsolved FeNi3 alloy was obtained.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: BLFMN was subsequently investigated as an electrode material for La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O3-delta (LSGM) electrolyte (300 mu m) supported SOFCs.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Symmetrical cells using BLFMN as electrodes with the cell configuration of BLFMN//LSGM//BLFMN showed excellent redox reversibility and a peak power density (PPD) of 1.32 W cm(-2) at 850 degrees C when using H-2 as fuel.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cell with the cell configuration of BLFMN//LSGM//LSCF (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta) reached PPD of 1.61 and 0.41 W cm(-2) at 850 degrees C when operating with H-2 and CH4 fuel, respectively.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the single cell exhibit excellent stability (over 300 h) upon direct oxidation of hydrocarbon fuels of CH4 and C3H8.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study indicates that BLFMN is a promising redox reversible and coking resistant anode for SOFCs.
Titulo: A redox-reversible A/B-site co-doped BaFeO3 electrode for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells
